title: Bug 118780: Incorrect column names displayed in expression builder after setting alias for columns in dataset
description: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still shows the old column names instead of the new aliases when the dataset is selected.
OB: The expression builder displays the original column names instead of the new aliases when selecting the dataset.
EB: The expression builder should display the new column aliases when selecting the dataset.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new data source and dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset, e.g., 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. Observe that the old column name is displayed instead of the alias 'column1'.
